nodes.text: Padawannabes was a roleplaying-game adventure in year four of the Living Force campaign. It was a the first adventure in the Jedi Code trilogy and was written by Ronald A. Heintz and edited by Margaret van Poelgeest-Heintz and Jae Walker.
The heroes encounter a group of wannabe Jedi, and together they uncover a plot being enacted by the Thaereian military to murder Gavid Lermyn at a peace conference.
